articles.title: The FBI warns of an increased terrorist threat - NPR
articles.description: Senior American officials say Hamas' deadly Oct. 7 attack on Israel has created a new dynamic with dangerous implications at home and abroad.
articles.content:
FBI Director Christopher Wray testifies before the House Homeland Security Committee on Nov. 15, 2022.
Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images
